text: The Taming of the Shrew is a 1908 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithTHE TAMING OF THE SHREWAlan Goble. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film and stars Florence Lawrence, Arthur V. Johnson, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== *Florence Lawrence ... Katharina *Arthur V. Johnson ...
